analysis.Summary: This Vue component renders and manages the “Edit Profile” page within the auth module. It fetches the current user by ID, displays editable fields (avatar upload, username, name, description, socials, credentials, theme toggle), and provides Save and Delete Account actions.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a user interface for authenticated users to view and update their profile data and account settings, including uploading a photo, editing text fields, toggling dark mode, and deleting the account.

Components.name: UploadImage
Components.responsibility: Handles image selection and upload for user avatars

Components.name: Field
Components.responsibility: Generic form input with label, placeholder, v-model binding and optional validation

Components.name: Checkbox
Components.responsibility: Toggles a boolean option (dark mode theme)

Components.name: Button
Components.responsibility: Renders action buttons that trigger submit callbacks

Components.name: ProfileEditCredentials
Components.responsibility: Section component to edit user credentials (password/email)

Components.name: ProfileCompletion
Components.responsibility: (Commented out) Section suggesting profile completion steps

Functions.name: onMounted
Functions.purpose: Lifecycle hook: fetches the user record by ID and then shows the form

Functions.name: onSubmit
Functions.purpose: Calls the users.actions.update to save current user data

Functions.name: handleSave
Functions.purpose: (Declared but not used) Saves data then navigates to the user’s profile view

Functions.name: onSubmitDelete
Functions.purpose: Prompts for confirmation, marks account as removed, updates user, then logs out

Functions.name: redirectTo
Functions.purpose: Navigates to the User Profile page for the updated user

analysis.Usage: This component is registered as the view for the profile-edit route. When the route is entered with a user ID param, it mounts, loads data via the users store, and displays the form. Parent router or layout imports it and passes the route param.
Notes: The `show` flag prevents rendering until data is loaded
`organizationName` validation reference must come from inputsValidation but isn’t explicitly imported/destructured
`handleSave` is declared but not bound to any button
Minimal SCSS style block is empty or placeholder
